'''Ignited Treasure Hunter (I)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (I)]]''. The achievements are earned by opening [[Chests]] in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]].
